function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Viral infections caused by coronaviruses continue to emerge and pose a severe public health problem.","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread can lead to widespread illness, hospitalization, and mortality.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, vaccination programs, and research into antiviral therapies.","Technologies":"Vaccines, antiviral drugs, diagnostic tests, and public health surveillance tools.","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable individuals.","Owner":"Global health organizations, governments, healthcare institutions."},{"Description":"Highly contagious nature and relatively long incubation period of SARS-CoV-2 can lead to silent carriers and high basic reproductive number for COVID-19 virus.","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and isolating infected individuals, leading to rapid spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Increased testing capacity, contact tracing, isolation measures, and public health awareness campaigns.","Technologies":"Diagnostic tests, contact tracing apps, personal protective equipment, and public health communication tools.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, public health authorities.","Owner":"Public health organizations, governments, healthcare institutions."},{"Description":"Susceptibility of SARS-CoV-2 to heat and ultraviolet (UV) light may affect virus transmission under certain conditions.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of heat and UV light as sufficient measures to control virus transmission, leading to complacency in implementing other vital control measures.","Mitigation":"Education on comprehensive prevention measures, emphasizing the importance of multiple interventions in controlling virus transmission.","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, educational resources, and outreach programs.","People":"General population, policymakers, public health authorities.","Owner":"Public health organizations, governments, educational institutions."}]}
